billEvents.eventText: REFERRED TO CULTURAL AFFAIRS, TOURISM, PARKS AND RECREATION

title: Establishes the local historian for any municipality in the county of Niagara shall be appointed by the chief executive officer of such municipality
summary: Establishes the county historian for the county of Niagara and the local historian for any city, town or village located within the county of Niagara shall be appointed by the chief executive officer of such county, city, town or village.
currentCommittee: CULTURAL AFFAIRS, TOURISM, PARKS AND RECREATION
actClause: AN ACT to amend the arts and cultural affairs law, in relation to the appointment of local historians in the county of Niagara
